title: I Was Trending On Social Media This Weekend, Here’s Why (Ep 1810)
description:
I was trending again on twitter this weekend regarding a controversy surrounding Obama and Biden. In this episode, I explain what happened. I also address the liberal love affair with signaling, over results. The examples are everywhere. 

News Picks:

'You don't owe this guy': Ronny Jackson turned to Dan Bongino after Obama email.


The science on masks. 


Liberal hack site “NPR” hilariously launches a “disinformation” team.


Liberal writer gets something right and the Washington Post melts down. 

The border chaos continues as we shatter illegal immigration records.

Court awards $5.3M to Southwest Airlines flight attendant who was fired for pro-life Facebook posts.


Under new 'online sign-up for asylum,' illegal immigrants could flock to US airports: GOP senator.
